tool_description: This api can be used to scrap amazon products from the Amazon India web site.
name: Amazon Scrapper_v4
title: Amazon Scrapper

api_list.name: GET search results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/search/sdfsdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET a product offers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/products/sdfsdfdsf/offers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}/offers"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: GET a product details
api_list.description:
GET a product details.
You can get the product id from the URL when you search for a particular product. It is the next value after '/dp/'.
Eg: B08N5WG761 is the value we want from the url - 
https://www.amazon.in/Apple-MacBook-Chip-13-inch-256GB/dp/B08N5WG761/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N5WG761"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scrapper11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
